User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.16 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/10.0.648.133 Safari/534.16
Build Identifier: 

there are two minor bug here: 
1) Hebrew localization - all sentences with mixed 
2) All Localizations - the "click" image is covering some of the dynamic text

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
Scenario 1: Hebrew localization - left alignment breaks mixed sentences:
1) Change local settings of FB to Hebrew (תירבע).
2) Go to badges page -> text is localized
Scenario 2: all localizations - the "click" icon is moved upwards and touches text. see attached screen shot for details.
Actual Results:  
Scenario 1: 
All the sentences that are mixed (both Hebrew and Latin characters) are broken in the middle and displayed in the wrong order, causing them to be confusing and hard to understand.
see attached screen shot.

Expected Results:  
Scenario 1:
Localized sentences will be coherent and understandable.

Utest bug no. 129818
